citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30 am on
05/28/2015. The licensee was reached by phone and it was determined that a representative was not available for
the inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Lundy Kendall, Animal Care Inspector
